Key Match Events: Ryan Mendes scored the winning penalty in the 89th minute to give Cape Verde a 1-0 victory over Mauritania
Babacar Niasse of Mauritania was given a yellow card for infringement before Mendes' penalty
Miscellaneous Highlights: Cape Verde continued their unbeaten run after beating Mauritania 1-0
The match saw several missed chances and close calls for both teams
Others: The match was played at the Félix Houphouët Boigny stadium in Abidjan on January 29, 2024
Cape Verde's victory qualified them for the quarter-finals of the 2023 Africa Cup of Nations
